review:
Dr Asha praveena, we want to express our gratitude for your good work to my family dental problems. We have a healthy smile and Thank you for that.

Our family members went for Root canal treatment and cavities in teeth.  Dr Asha praveena explained the procedures and making each visit very friendly. Thanks to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She handled the pediatric person very friendly and tackled the issue. Treatment advice is explanatory

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Asha mam is very professional in her expertise *** *********  she explained all the methodology about procedure before starting the treatment. Answers all our questions politely about dental knowledge  ,then she give options to us to take decisions then only she start treatment. 
Doctor did my RCT procedure smoothly  with painless procedure and now missing teeth procedure is at to start.
Overall  madam follows all-latest technology in Dentistry  including Chaitanya madam thanks for her smooth procedure for laser  RCT procedure. 
God bless them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly, thoroughly professional and excellent treatment given. Chose Dr. Asha as the place is a mere 3 minute walk from my house and am glad that I took the decision to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very friendly doctor... she explains everything clearly and politely whatever the silly doubts I ask for and I feared to do root canal as I already heared so many negatives about the procedure but the doctor explains me politely how important it is to do and during the procedure also many time's I'm not co-operating well as it cause severe pain but she is so calm and handled it really well and gives me more comfort.

The doctor is very very good and thoroughly understands the problem and diagnosed very well. I took my Mom for root canal and bridge implant. She assured all tooth problems will be fixed and I am extremely satisfied with her treatment. My Mom is also very happy and always appreciates her.

review: I was looking for a denstist for the last few weeks and I got the best one . Dr. Asha is such a sweet person . It was my first time I have visited and it was an amazing experience over all . She explained the issue very nicely and did the clean and filling treatment post consultation. Thank you so much Dr.Asha for such amazing experience. I would highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Asha Praveena  was very patient with me. I was always a bit scared of any procedures related to my teeth. But the doctor made sure I was calm and performed the procedure. I very much satisfied by the outcome and the services offered at the clinic. Tha k you so much Dr. Asha and Dr. Resmi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came from Anantapur to get treatment done from Dr. Asha. She is our family Dr from many years. Though we have shifted back to our native place, it is the trust that brought us back here for treatment. Dr is friendly and explains very clearly, very patient during the procedure. Got few root canals and bridges done from her. Would definitely recommend Dr. Asha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Asha doctor is very friendly and she is explaining the problem and treatment to the patient very clearly. She used to clarify all the questions with patience. I went for wisdom tooth removal. And went to root canal treatment for my mom. Post treatment we didn't face any issues. She will be always reachable in mobile.
Overall i am Fully satisfied and highly recommending this clinic for all the teeth problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Am very happy to get treated with dr asha. She made me feel at ease all through the procedure and was asking me if I was okay. I was very apprehensive in the beginning, by the end of procedure, I was sure am that dr asha will be my family dentist. Thank you so much Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Awesome Experience. Happy with the service. we are happy and would recommend the doctor to others as well.

I have visited the clinic for my wife's tooth decay and  pain  problem  and for my partial dentures. Doctors patiently done the procedure and my wife feel comfort. Dr. Asa Praveena is our family octor for the past 10 years.
